tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Acrylic Partial Denture,Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental X-Ray,Dental Crowns,
review: Ramesh Goradia:- I am 80 yrs age and have frequent dental health issues such as Cavity formation, Cap fixing,Root-Canal,Teeth Extraction and making small dentures. I am visiting Dr.Shruti Shah for over more than seven years and she has given me excellent treatment in all above issues. Dr.Shruti Shah is thoroughly professional and her judgement and diagnosis is unquestionably superb.She has very well equipped clinic with latest, modern equipment and her supporting staff is also very well trained. Dr. Shruti Shah's associates for making ceramic caps and dentures also give very high quality products with warranty for long service. Dr. Shruti Shah coordinates her dental  appointments so well that there is no waiting at her clinic. I have immensely benefitted by her diagnosis and treatment and of course all these at very affordable cost. Wish her great success and may she scale commendable achievements in her field. Ramesh Goradia.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for such a detailed feedback.
We appreciate it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
From where should I start. 

For all my  any dental issues I always go Dr. Shruti Shah.  She always gives you best advise. If the tooth is to be saved, she will do her best to do so. 

Let me tell you, I just under went with my fourth implant surgery. Dr. Somnath, who does surgery at her clinic has a very good hand. 

Mostly the doctor's keep you waiting after giving you the appointment time. But not in case of Dr. Shruti Shah. She is very flexible in giving appointments & one thing I always appreciate that she doesn't keep us waiting & always welcome us with a big smile. In short, I fully trust her in her decision making pertaing to my dental treatment. 

Thank you Dr. Shah for being always there for me. 

God Bless you & your team üôèüíê
reply_text: Thank you so much for your feedback Mr bhesania.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
The primary traits one seeks in a Doctor are Knowledge, Approach and Execution. 

While one can be an expert in the field of Medicine through experience, the other aspects require a humane touch, which Dr.Shruti has excelled. The explanation(s) provided was immaculate, to the point and functionally optimal.

The knowledge gained by her over the years has resulted in perfect skills for execution which results in optimum resolution of the medical issue leaving the patient slightly more aware about his/her health(thanks to Dr. Shruti) and more confident of his/her continued wellbeing, through enlightenment recieved from the Doctor!
reply_text:
Thank you so much.
We appreciate your feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr.Shruti Shah as my lower teeth were getting crowded and ill shaped. My treatment for invisalign was well explained and cost effective hence a very easy decision to take. My first set of invisalign was couried to me in Switzerland within a month and the instructions and monthly follow ups by the doctor worked brillant for my teeth to get alligned in less than 12 months. I would highy recommend her for any treatments !! Thank u for giving me the smile i was always dreaming of!!
reply_text:
Am glad you got the results that you wanted.
Happy to see the change in your smile.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to Dr after a mess up by another dentist. She explained to be what the problem was and advised me to go back to the dentist and give him/her a chance to their mistake. 
Unfortunately, the new advise given was to have a silver filling. Again I spoke to Dr Shah and she advised that silver fillings are outdated methodology. I visited her again yesterday and got a composite filing, and she managed to solve my problem with just one filing, which was painless and quick.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your feedback.

review: Dr. Shruti has helped me with a lot of my dental issues, including cavities, root canal, ceramic cap fixing, cleaning and polishing. She is very quick with her work, explains the problem and therefore the solution correctly and makes sure you are comfortable with it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Shruti has the most amazing ability to make you feel comfortable in one of the most stressful situations i.e. in the dentist's chair. Her friendly, enthusiastic banter and ability to lighten the mood while being specific and accurate in her diagnosis puts her way up there in our list of accomplished docs, for sure.
